property.name: Flavor
property.value: For hundreds of years Ugin slept, encased in the cocoon of stone and magic Sarkhan had created using a shard of a Zendikari hedron. As Ugin lay dormant, his spectral guardians kept vigil.

property.value: Whenever another nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, bolster 1. (Choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures you control and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)

property.value: "The dragonlords rule the tempests of the skies. Here in the wastes, the storms are mine to command."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dromoka has regard for the humans who serve under her. In return for her protection, they obey with steadfast loyalty, acting as weapons for her and her scalelords against the other clans.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Kolaghan send them at us. We kill and raise them. They fight the next wave the Kolaghan send. It's a neat little cycle." —Asmala, Silumgar sorcerer

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Sibsig Icebreakers enters the battlefield, each player discards a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I almost envy them. They can't get frostbite." —Kirada, Silumgar enforcer

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Silumgar takes pride in the diversity of his sibsig.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The Silumgar hide behind the deadly wildlife of their swamps. They'd rather scheme in their jungle palaces than face us." —Khibat, Kolaghan warrior

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The realization that one is dying is far more terrifying than death itself." —Sidisi, Silumgar vizier

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This pestilence robs us of glorious death in battle. We starve to death with full bellies and drown trying to slake our unnatural thirst." —Kerai Hatesinger, Kolaghan warrior

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.) When Vulturous Aven exploits a creature, you draw two cards and you lose 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The crumbling temples on the tortoise's back are monuments to the decadence of the ancient Sultai. Though it harkens back to the era of the khans, Silumgar allows it to walk his territory as a warning to those who would oppose him.

property.value: Attacking creatures you control have double strike.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Atarka's people starve while she feasts upon the bounty of their hunts. They must conquer ever more lands just for the sake of their own subsistence." —Arel, Unseen Whisperer

property.name: Rules
property.value: Exile the top X cards of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play those cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Destroy any number of target creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller puts a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dragons emerge from tempests fully formed and terribly hungry.

property.value: As an additional cost to cast Draconic Roar, you may reveal a Dragon card from your hand. Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to target creature. If you revealed a Dragon card or controlled a Dragon as you cast Draconic Roar, Draconic Roar deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Put two 1/1 red Goblin creature tokens onto the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Atarka goblins meet their demise as readily as their Temur counterparts did, but usually under big, winged shadows.

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1: Look at the top card of your library. If it's a noncreature, nonland card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand. −2: When you cast your next instant or sorcery spell from your hand this turn, it gains rebound. −9: You get an emblem with "Your opponents can't cast noncreature spells."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Necromaster Dragon deals combat damage to a player, you may pay 2. If you do, put a 2/2 black Zombie creature token onto the battlefield and each opponent puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two — • Return target creature card with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. • You gain 4 life. • Counter target creature spell. • Draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, untap Pristine Skywise. It gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The elite of Ojutai's brood, the skywise see their enemies as puzzles to be solved.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever you sacrifice a creature, target opponent sacrifices a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Bring forth the dead, their skull-grins and rattle-bones. We will feast upon their wailing ghosts." —Silumgar, translated from Draconic

property.name: Rules
property.value: +1: Draw a card, then add one mana of any color to your mana pool. −2: Put a 4/4 red Dragon creature token with flying onto the battlefield. −8: Search your library for any number of Dragon creature cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying Whenever Savage Ventmaw attacks, add %%%^^^ to your mana pool. Until end of turn, this mana doesn't empty from your mana pool as steps and phases end.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Choose two — • Counter target noncreature spell. • Return target permanent to its owner's hand. • Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. • Destroy target planeswalker.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flying When Swift Warkite enters the battlefield, you may put a creature card with converted mana cost 3 or less from your hand or graveyard onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste. Return it to your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

property.name: Rules
property.value: When Ancestral Statue enters the battlefield, return a nonland permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The mage awakened the statue in hopes of learning the lost lore of her clan, but the statue was interested only in war.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add % or ^ to your mana pool. 4%^: Atarka Monument becomes a 4/4 red and green Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Atarka is worshipped and fed by her subjects at Ayagor, the Dragon's Bowl.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Defender Custodian of the Trove enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Silumgar delights in repurposing the treasures of other clans to serve his own ravenous greed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: As long as you control a Dragon, Dragonloft Idol gets +1/+1 and has flying and trample.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The idols were forged during the time of the Khanfall, when the dragons came to rule Tarkir and its people aligned themselves with the five dragonlords.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add ^ or @ to your mana pool. 4^@: Dromoka Monument becomes a 4/4 green and white Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dromoka rules her clan from the Great Aerie atop Arashin, the central city of the Shifting Wastes.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Gate Smasher can be attached only to a creature with toughness 4 or greater. Equipped creature gets +3/+0 and has trample. Equip 3

property.name: Rules
property.value: You may look at face-down creatures you don't control. (You may do this at any time.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It sees all, but it reveals what it sees only to a chosen few." —Taigam, Ojutai master

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add $ or % to your mana pool. 4$%: Kolaghan Monument becomes a 4/4 black and red Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kolaghan has no lasting home, but her disciples leave relics to mark her conquests.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add @ or # to your mana pool. 4@#: Ojutai Monument becomes a 4/4 white and blue Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ojutai spends time at all his strongholds, but he most favors Cori Stronghold for his meditation.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add # or $ to your mana pool. 4#$: Silumgar Monument becomes a 4/4 blue and black Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Silumgar dominates his clan from a fortress on the Marang River, where he rests upon piles of treasure.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +0/+2 and has reach. (It can block creatures with flying.) Equip 2 (2: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Dragons are our betters, but we will fight them if our dragonlord orders it."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Equipped creature gets +1/+1. Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may attach Stormrider Rig to it. Equip 2

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, `: Draw a card. Activate this ability only if you've cast a noncreature spell this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Abzan, Jeskai, Sultai, Mardu, Temur—names lost to history, yet worthy of further study." —Narset

property.name: Rules
property.value: 2, `, Sacrifice Vial of Dragonfire: Vial of Dragonfire deals 2 damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Designed by an ancient artificer, the vials are strong enough to hold the very breath of a dragon—until it's needed.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card and put it onto the battlefield tapped. Then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The land is ever resilient. Should it die, it will be reborn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: `: Add 1 to your mana pool. `: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Spend this mana only to cast a Dragon creature spell. 2, `, Sacrifice Haven of the Spirit Dragon: Return target Dragon creature card or Ugin planeswalker card from your graveyard to your hand.
